c74object.name: cage.offset
c74object.digest: Insert time at the beginning of a score
c74object.description: cage.offset allows inserting time at the beginning of a roll or score.

inlet.digest: Roll or score which will be offset

inlet.description: The offset time is in milliseconds for bach.roll, in measures, or measures and symbolic units, for bach.score.

objarg.name: offset
objarg.description: The optional argument sets the initial offset. The offset time is in milliseconds for bach.roll, in measures, or measures and symbolic units, for bach.score.

method.name: bang
method.description: Output the score obtained from the most recently received input data.

method.name: llll
method.description: cage.offset expects a roll or score gathered syntax in the first inlet, which will be offset. The offset amount is specified by the llll received in the second inlet (in milliseconds for bach.roll; in measure for bach.score if it is a single integer, in measures symbolic_units if it is a list of 2 elements). For instance, if the llll in the second inlet is 3 1/4 the offset will be 3 measures and then a 1/4 rest; if the second inlet receives 0 716/16, the offset will be 716/16 (no matter how many measures this will span). The roll or score with offset will then be output.

method.name: number
method.digest: In second inlet: sets the offset amount (in milliseconds for

entry.name: Inlet 1 (score)
entry.description: Roll or score which will be offset.

entry.name: Inlet 2 (number)
entry.description: Offset time. The offset time is in milliseconds for bach.roll, in measures, or measures and symbolic units, for bach.score.
